item.description:
Opportunity to practice French halfway between monthly Int'l Meetup dates. Please bring some pictures of France to share and inspire conversation!

Brad and I decided to try to meet more frequently than once a month. For now, we've agreed to meet on the 29th this month at La Festa again. Hope you can join us!

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Dover-Portsmouth French Language
